"Hokuto": "You're... the ARKS who's been making the rounds, I bet."
"I've been hearing about the scope of your efforts. I hope to see good things here in Stia, as well."
"Oh, it's you..."
"It seems you put on quite an impressive display in this most recent battle."
"Taking that skill into account, I'd like to ask something of you."
"Is that alright?"
"First, I want you to clear the Cocoons of Stia. Good luck out there."
"I see... Another time, then."
"You're back."
"Well then, let me just verify the data."
"...Hm, I see."
"Yes, perfect! Thank you."
"I was right to ask for your help. I got some very valuable data."
"...Now, I'm sorry for being so sudden, but I'm also going to want you to clear the Tower as well."
"Let me know when you have the time."
"Are you ready?"
"If you are, I'd like to continue the investigation."
"This time I ask that you clear the Tower of Stia."
"I look forward to the good data it will provide. Best of luck."
"Is that so... Well, it can't be helped."
"You're back. I'll start taking data now, then."
"...Uh-huh. ...Ohh!"
"Nice results. With this, my research can continue."
"Thinking on it, it's quite peculiar that Stia, which is usually uninhabited by people, would have training facilities."
"Why would someone build them in a place like this, I wonder?"
"I hear that researchers in all areas have been studying these Trainia."
"Later I should like to share information with them. We'll surely make a new discovery."
"You have done us all a great service."
"I thank you from the bottom of my heart."
"The Trainia facilities are full of mystery."
"I think my research will help to unravel those mysteries, if only a little."
